cards.title: Mythos
setup: At the start of the game, put {Mythos}'s villain character cards into play, 'Insubstantial Rumor' side up. Search the villain deck for Dangerous Investigations and put it into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: {Mythos} and Dangerous Investigation are indestructible. Activate any {MythosDanger}, {MythosGreen}, {MythosClue} effects that match the icon on top of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, the players may play up to 5 cards from the top of the villain deck. Then if there are {H} tokens on Dangerous Investigation, flip {Mythos}' villain character cards.
flippedGameplay: When {Mythos} flips to this side, remove Dangerous Investigation from the game.
Activate any {MythosDanger}, {MythosGreen}, {MythosClue} effects that match the icon on top of the villain deck.
{MythosDanger} Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, the players may play the top card of the villain deck. Then:
{MythosClue} Play the top card of the villain deck.
{MythosDanger} {Mythos} deals each hero target {H} infernal damage.

openingLines.MinistryofStrategicSciencesTitanCharacte: Ministry of Strategic Sciences Titan  placeholder

cards.title: Aclastyph, Who Peers
body: At the end of the villain turn:
{MythosDanger} This card deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 melee damage. Discard the top card of the villain deck.
{MythosClue} This card regains 2HP. Discard the top card of the villain deck.
{MythosMadness} This card deals each other target 1 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Try not to make eye contact.

cards.title: Clockwork Revenant
body: {MythosDanger} Increase damage dealt by this card by X, where X is 10 minus its current HP.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Hey, grabby! You don't know when to stop, do you?

cards.title: Dangerous Investigation
body: {MythosClue} At the end of the villain turn, the players may play the top card of the villain deck to add a token to this card.
At the end of the villain turn, {Mythos} deals the X hero targets with the highest HP 3 infernal damage each, where X is {H} minus the number of villain cards the players chose to play this turn.

flavorQuotes.text: The Ministry agents are{BR}right behind me, as planned.

cards.title: Doktor Von Faust
body: At the end of the villain turn, search the villain deck for a Clockwork Revenant and put it into play. Shuffle the villain deck. If no card was put into play this way, this card deals each non-villain target 3 lightning damage.
{MythosClue} Reduce damage dealt to this card by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: I do not require magic.{BR}Ze principles of electrodynamics are{BR}quite compatible with deceased organics.

cards.flavorReference: Doktor Von Faust, Department of Secrets #9

cards.title: Faithful Proselyte
body: {MythosMadness} When this card enters play, destroy {H - 2} equipment cards.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the second highest HP {H - 1} lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: The first records we{BR}have are from WWII, when The Forgotten Order{BR}started gathering converts. They're still{BR}recruiting.

cards.flavorReference: Director Wells, A Field Guide{BR}for the Apocalypse

cards.title: Hallucinated Horror
body: {MythosMadness}{MythosDanger} When this card enters play, play the top card of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero target 2 sonic damage.
Destroy this card when a hero is dealt damage by another hero target.

flavorQuotes.text: What a...strange head you have.{BR}Do you want something for that?

cards.title: Otherworldly Alignment
body: At the end of the villain turn:
{MythosDanger} {Mythos} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} infernal damage.
{MythosMadness} {Mythos} deals each non-villain target 1 infernal damage.
{MythosClue} {Mythos} deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H} psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I struck a bargain, in{BR}order to return. There was some{BR}sacrifice. But also some gain.

cards.title: Pallid Academic
body: When this card enters play, put all ongoing cards in the villain trash into play.
When a hero target is dealt damage by another hero target:
{MythosDanger} Play the top card of the villain deck.
{MythosMadness} Move the bottom card of a deck to the top of that deck.

flavorQuotes.text: This world belongs to those{BR}creatures of myth, forgotten by{BR}humanity. They will free it from its pain!

cards.flavorReference: Academic, A Field Guide{BR}for the Apocalypse

cards.title: Prey Upon the Mind
body: Destroy {H - 2} hero ongoing cards.
{MythosMadness} Each player discards 1 card.
{MythosDanger} {Mythos} deals each hero target 1 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: How many more friends{BR}are you prepared to lose?

cards.title: Revelations
body: {Mythos} regains {H} HP for each environment card in play. Move 2 cards from the villain trash to the bottom of the villain deck.
{MythosClue} Reduce damage dealt by hero targets by 1 until the start of the villain turn.
{MythosMadness} Each Minion regains {H} HP.
cards.flavorText: “Thank you, for leading me{BR}here,” Mythos said, turning to Mara.{BR}“I have no further use for you. Your{BR}trinket, on the other hand...”

cards.title: Ritual Site
body: {MythosDanger} Increase damage dealt by environment cards to hero targets by 1.
{MythosMadness} At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero target 1 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: This is where it all started for me.

cards.title: Rusted Artifact
body: Increase damage dealt to hero targets by 1.
{MythosMadness}{MythosDanger} This card is indestructible and immune to damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Do you mind, luv? It's hard to look for clues under all these leaves.

cards.title: Torn Page
body: The first time each turn that:
{MythosDanger} a hero card is drawn...
{MythosMadness} a hero card enters play...
{MythosClue} a power is used...
...this card deals that hero 2 infernal damage and 2 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: This is not exactly my area of{BR}expertise. Where's that comedian?{BR}Magician, whatever.

cards.title: Whispers and Lies
body: At the end of the villain turn, the villain target with the lowest HP deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 sonic damage.
{MythosMadness} Heroes gain the following power:
Power: Shuffle 2 cards from the villain trash into the villain deck.
powers: Shuffle 2 cards from the villain trash into the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Truth does not disappear just{BR}because it cannot be seen.

cards.flavorReference: Lady of the Wood, Fall of Titan One-shot

cards.title: “Your Darkest Secrets”
body: Discard the top card of each hero deck.
{Mythos} deals each hero 1 infernal damage for each card in their hand that shares a keyword with the card discarded from their deck.
